LanguageData.AB_PsychotropicFungusHigh.stages.0.label: ate some weird mushrooms
LanguageData.AB_PsychotropicFungusHigh.stages.0.descr: I ate a bunch of weird mushrooms and now I'm high as a kite
LanguageData.AB_PsychotropicFungusWithdrawal.stages.1: My hands are shaking. It's as if the world has lost all colours.
LanguageData.AB_RawRimeNodulesHigh.stages.0.label: rime freshness
LanguageData.AB_RawRimeNodulesHigh.stages.0.descripti: Those rime nodules I consumed make me feel refreshed and calm.
LanguageData.AB_ForsakenNight.stages.0.label: preternatural darkness
LanguageData.AB_ForsakenNight.stages.0.description: It is as if the sun itself was being drowned in despair. I hate it.
LanguageData.AB_ForsakenRain.stages.0.label: soaking wet and dark
LanguageData.AB_ForsakenRain.stages.0.description: I'm soaking wet, and I can't see anything.
LanguageData.AB_ForsakenThunderstorm.stages.0.label: preternatural storm
LanguageData.AB_ForsakenThunderstorm.stages.0.descrip: It is dark as the void, and now lightning is falling everywhere. We are doomed.
LanguageData.AB_RedFogThought.stages.0.label: unnatural weather
LanguageData.AB_RedFogThought.stages.0.description: This fog tastes weird. It looks weird. It FEELS wrong, as if it wasn't of this world.
LanguageData.AB_VolcanicAshThought.stages.0.label: can't breathe
LanguageData.AB_VolcanicAshThought.stages.0.descripti: It is SO hard to breathe through this ash!
LanguageData.AB_RedFogThoughtPositive.stages.0.label: i love unnatural weather
LanguageData.AB_RedFogThoughtPositive.stages.0.descri: Actually... I love this fog. This fog is my friend. I would kiss the fog if I could. Obey. Consume. Caress an ocular jelly. Wait, what?
